Hi, I'm Lindsey.

I'm a lead engineer at WebDevStudios where I lead a team developing quality websites & web applications for clients. I've created website for a variety of industries including higher ed, small business, not for profit, and enterprise level businesses.

When I'm not developing websites, I live in South Philadelphia with my wife, 2 dogs, a cat and a bird. I like to cook, travel, read, and try as many different types of crafts as I can.
